ipv4-range-expander.cardInputDescription: Enter the start and end IPv4 addresses to calculate the CIDR range and expanded address information.
ipv4-range-expander.cardResultsDescription: View the calculated CIDR range and expanded address information.
ipv4-range-expander.label: Label
ipv4-range-expander.invalidCombinationDescription: The end IPv4 address is lower than the start IPv4 address. This is not valid and no result could be calculated.
